heroSection.title: Mohamed Ali Youssouf
heroSection.description: I transform ideas into modern, high-performing, and elegant web applications. Let's discuss your next project.

aboutSection.title: My Journey, My Passion
aboutSection.description: A Web developer, specialized in frontend developer with a passion for technology and innovation.

whoIAm.title: Who I Am
whoIAm.description: A glimpse into my professional journey and what drives me.
content: My name is Mohamed Ali Youssouf, a Web developer, specialized in Frontend development with a passion for technology and innovation. With a master‚Äôs degree in computer engineering, I have worked on various projects that allowed me to develop technical and creative skills while meeting the specific needs of clients and users.

I am passionate about web development because it enables me to turn ideas into tangible and functional solutions. What I love most is solving complex problems with simple and elegant interfaces. For me, every line of code should enhance the user experience.
I am constantly seeking new opportunities to contribute to impactful projects and continue growing in the field of web development.

certificate.title: Certificate
certificate.description: My training in frontend development at TechPro Education.
content: I earned a frontend developer certificate after completing an intensive online training program with TechPro Education. This training enabled me to master key technologies such as HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, React.js, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and other modern web development tools.
Thanks to this certification, I have strengthened my technical skills and solidified my ability to deliver complete, high-performing, and well-structured projects.

toolbox.title: My Toolbox
toolbox.description: The technologies I use to build digital experiences.

hobbies.title: Beyond Code
hobbies.description: Discover my passions that fuel my creativity.

projectsSection.title: Featured Projects
projectsSection.description: Explore impactful digital solutions crafted with passion.

testimonialsSection.title: What Clients Say about Me
testimonialsSection.description: Don't just take my word for it. See what my clients have to say about my work.

testimonials.name: Rohaty.com Team
testimonials.text: Thanks to Mohamed Ali‚Äôs work, Rohaty.com has become a smooth and modern platform. His expertise in frontend, mastery of UX/UI, and ability to handle technical details enabled the launch of a functional, user-centered marketplace without online payments. Clean and well-structured work.

testimonials.name: Djibstudy Team
testimonials.text: Mohamed Ali turned an idea into an ambitious project: making online learning accessible to all Djiboutians. His involvement in design, ergonomics, and site structure showcases his ability to create effective educational platforms. We‚Äôre proud to have him as our lead developer.

testimonials.name: Djib-Ticket Team
testimonials.text: Developing a local ticketing marketplace was a real challenge, and Mohamed Ali rose to it brilliantly. His choice of tools (Next.js, Convex, Sanity...) and management of features like search, categories, and media demonstrate his professionalism. Djib-Ticket is on the right track thanks to him.

testimonials.name: PrimoAfrikaNet
testimonials.text: We entrusted Mohamed Ali with creating our showcase website, and he understood our needs from the start. The result is impressive: modern design, intuitive navigation, and excellent support. We are very satisfied with our collaboration.

testimonials.name: Saleh Ismael
testimonials.text: Mohamed Ali created an elegant and professional website to showcase my profile. He is attentive, responsive, and always offers valuable ideas. Working with him was a true pleasure, and I highly recommend him.

contactSection.title: Let's create something amazing together
contactSection.description: Ready to bring your next project to life? Let's connect and discuss how I can help you achieve your goals.

portfolioProjects.title: Full E-commerce Marketplace for Djibouti
results: Complete online ordering and checkout system
Simplified payments and communication via WhatsApp
Built with Next.js, TypeScript, Sanity, Tailwind CSS, Shadcn, NextAuth, and Resend
portfolioProjects.description: Rohaty.com is a modern and user-friendly online marketplace built to connect sellers and buyers in Djibouti. It enables vendors to manage products and orders seamlessly, while customers enjoy a smooth shopping experience enhanced by WhatsApp integration for order finalization and support.
challenges: Creating a full-featured e-commerce system in a market with limited digital payment infrastructure.
Implementing secure user authentication and scalable order management.
solutions: Developed a complete cart and ordering flow integrated with WhatsApp for localized payment handling.
Integrated NextAuth for secure authentication and user session management.
Used Sanity as a flexible and scalable CMS for dynamic content control.
Implemented Resend for transactional emails like order confirmations and vendor alerts.

portfolioProjects.title: AI-Based Interview Preparation Tool
results: Personalized feedback and tailored question sets
portfolioProjects.description: AI Interview Prep is an innovative platform that uses AI to simulate realistic job interviews, providing users with personalized feedback and tailored question sets to improve their performance. The tool is designed to help job seekers excel in technical and behavioral interviews.
challenges: Ensuring AI-generated feedback is accurate and actionable.
Optimizing for low-latency responses during mock interviews.
solutions: Fine-tuned OpenAI models for precise interview feedback.
Implemented server-side caching to reduce API latency.

portfolioProjects.title: Consulting Platform for Africans in Turkey
results: Connects entrepreneurs to Turkish market opportunities
Built with a professional CMS and responsive design
portfolioProjects.description: PrimoAfrikanet is a consulting platform dedicated to Africans in Turkey, connecting entrepreneurs with local opportunities through consulting services, events, and training.
challenges: Creating a clear and accessible multilingual interface.
Enabling dynamic content management for non-technical admins.
solutions: Implemented a Sanity CMS for content flexibility.
Responsive design optimized for desktop and mobile.

portfolioProjects.title: Educational Platform for Djiboutian Students
portfolioProjects.description: Djibstudy is an educational platform offering free resources, career guidance, and blog articles to support Djiboutian students in their academic journey.
challenges: Regularly curating relevant content for students.
Maintaining a simple design while integrating learning features.
solutions: Custom blog system for publishing educational content.
Accessible and structured design for easy navigation.

portfolioProjects.title: Modern portfolio website
portfolioProjects.description: A professional portfolio built for a frontend developer to showcase projects, skills, and experience.
challenges: Creating a smooth and animated user experience while keeping performance high.
Ensuring perfect mobile responsiveness.
solutions: Used Framer Motion for smooth animations.
Implemented responsive grid layout with Tailwind.
results: Fast loading thanks to static deployment.

portfolioProjects.title: E-commerce amazon clone
results: Vendors can create their online stores
portfolioProjects.description: Djib Market is a multi-vendor e-commerce platform for Djiboutian merchants. Each vendor can create and manage their own online store with an intuitive interface.
challenges: Managing multi-user roles for vendors and customers.
Creating an intuitive vendor dashboard interface.
solutions: Used Clerk for authentication and role management.
Sanity for dynamic product and category management.

portfolioProjects.title: Cultural website for the Afar diaspora
portfolioProjects.description: A website promoting Afar culture and heritage with informational pages, images, and community updates.
challenges: Designing a multi-page site with consistent structure.
Ensuring good accessibility and smooth navigation.
solutions: Clean HTML structure with intuitive navigation.
Optimized for mobile and cross-device usability.
results: Promotion of Afar culture and heritage.

portfolioProjects.title: Ticketing Platform for Djibouti
results: Users can search and book tickets online
portfolioProjects.description: DjibTicket is an online ticketing platform designed to simplify ticket sales and bookings for events in Djibouti. It allows users to search, filter, and book tickets with ease.
challenges: Providing fast and efficient search within an event database.
Creating a seamless interface for ticket display and booking.
solutions: Used Convex for real-time, high-performance search.
Modern interface with dynamic filtering and reusable components.

portfolioProjects.title: Learning Platform for Djiboutian Students
results: Video courses, quizzes, and progress tracking
portfolioProjects.description: A simple yet effective LMS (Learning Management System) for Djiboutian students. It provides a structured educational experience with videos, quizzes, and learning resources.
challenges: Designing a dynamic quiz system.
Structuring courses into modules.
solutions: Reusable components for lessons, quizzes, and progress tracking.
Fluid and responsive user experience.

portfolioProjects.title: Showcase Site for Tech Startup
results: Animations and clear calls to action
Built with Tailwind CSS and React
portfolioProjects.description: A professional landing page designed to showcase a tech startup, featuring an attractive design, modern animations, and a layout optimized for conversion.
challenges: Creating a smooth visual experience.
Optimizing for conversion rates.
solutions: Framer Motion animations for dynamic navigation.
Reusable and responsive components.

portfolioProjects.title: Financial Management Web Application
results: Track income and expenses with interactive charts
portfolioProjects.description: Personal Budget Tracker is a simple and interactive web application that allows users to track their personal finances through charts and visual reports.
challenges: Creating clear visualizations of financial data.
Enabling intuitive input for income and expenses.
solutions: Used Chart.js for dynamic charts.
Simple and responsive UI with React.

portfolioProjects.title: Educational platform built with React
portfolioProjects.description: A team project focused on delivering accessible IT education through a simple and structured interface.
challenges: Designing a clear and engaging educational interface.
Coordinating effectively with team members.
solutions: Used Bootstrap for fast and responsive layout.
Organized content into easy-to-navigate modules.

portfolioProjects.title: Recipe discovery website
portfolioProjects.description: A culinary discovery platform featuring recipes with a visually appealing layout.
challenges: Presenting recipes in an attractive and clean layout.
Maintaining fast load times for a better user experience.
solutions: Optimized static site with elegant layout.
Simple navigation using pure CSS for better performance.
results: Elegant layout for discovering new recipes.
Built with HTML, CSS, and JS.

portfolioProjects.title: Travel guide to Japan
portfolioProjects.description: A lightweight interactive guide showcasing tourist attractions in Kyoto with a visual and simple approach.
challenges: Creating simple and intuitive navigation.
Displaying a lot of information in a lightweight format.
solutions: Organized content into sections with anchor navigation.
Used basic HTML components to ensure fast performance.
results: Built with HTML, CSS, and JS.

portfolioProjects.title: Basic Calculator Web Application
portfolioProjects.description: A simple and elegant calculator built in React that allows users to perform basic operations with an intuitive and responsive interface.
challenges: Handling calculation logic without using string evaluators like `eval()`.
Making the calculator compatible with mobile screens.
solutions: Custom logic for handling arithmetic operations.
Responsive design with CSS Flexbox for optimal display on all devices.

portfolioProjects.title: Minimalist Task Manager
results: Organize tasks with a clear interface
portfolioProjects.description: A minimalist task management application that allows users to add, delete, and mark tasks as completed.
challenges: Providing smooth state management for tasks added or removed.
Maintaining a simple and effective UX without overloading the interface.
solutions: Used React‚Äôs `useState` hook for dynamic task list management.
Clean styling with Tailwind CSS for a clear and fast user experience.
